issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: jwross@us.ibm.com
assignee.emailAddress: jwross at us dot ibm dot com

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The exception stack trace is shown below.

This can be reproduced by cloning the github project:
https://github.com/glyn/aries-subsystems-on-virgo-kernel
checking out the ARIES-942 tag and following the instructions in README.md.

Note ARIES-942 tags a branch so that master is kept working ok.

fields.summary: Nesting subsystems using nested directories produces UnsupportedOperationException

comments.body: Note that if the nested subsystem directory is replaced by a corresponding JAR, the UOE does not occur.
